rules_text: You may have Lazav, Master Shapeshifter enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Lazav, Master Shapeshifter, it’s legendary in addition to its other types, and it has “Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may have Lazav, Master Shapeshifter become a copy of that creature, except its name is Lazav, Master Shapeshifter, it’s legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.”
